import React from 'react' import { AboutMeContainer, HeaderContainer, Header, ImgContainer, Img, SummaryContainer, Summary, SubHeader, TestamentContainer, FriendName, FriendQuote } from './AboutMeElements' import techTowerPhoto from "../../images/connor-tech-tower.jpg" import ImageSlider from '../ImageSlider/ImageSlider' import { SliderData } from '../ImageSlider/SliderData' import { shivamData, garrettData, adithyaData } from './Data' const AboutMe = () => { return ( <>
Education & Honors
 I am a 3rd year Computer Science major, studying to earn a bachelor's degree from the Georgia Institute of Technology's College of Computing. I originally entered Georgia Tech as a Mechanical Engineering major, but I switched as soon as I took my first CS class.



Upon my acceptance to Tech, I was chosen to be 1 of only 6 students in my accepted class, to receive the extremely generous, GodBold Family Foundation, full-ride scholarship. It covers 8 full semesters of tuition, housing, meal plans, and more! I wouldn’t have been able to attend Tech without it, which is why I am the utmost grateful for it
So... what kind of person am I?
 While I COULD go and summarize who I am in a short paragraph or two... thats kinda lame.... So, let’s see what my amazing friends have to say!! {garrettData.friendName} " {garrettData.friendQuote} " {shivamData.friendName} " {shivamData.friendQuote} " {adithyaData.friendName} " {adithyaData.friendQuote} " Thanks guys!! Alright, To finish this section out, I would also say that I am ... ) } export default AboutMe
